poem.title: Kompromat
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
"Tvoim uzkim plecham..." - Mandelshtam
Hear no evil spilled the beans and speak No evil nodded till it hurt See no evil plays a Keystone Cop In Cheka leather with a riding crop To punish bedbugs on some slender back.
Snow melts away but "manuscripts don't burn" They haunt the lots like trash from Tetrapak. That cruel clip the poet didn't show Was lifted from "La Religieuse". No blame No blushes: Diderot. Just turn it off.
